caption.center: ANDREW A. SHERWOOD, APPELLANT, v. STATE OF MISSOURI, RESPONDENT.

court.center: Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.

date.center: Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied January 2,

opinion.posture: APPEAL FROM THE CIRCUIT COURT OF CLAY COUNTY; GLENNON E. McFARLAND, JUDGE.
opinion.attorneys:
David S. Durbin, Asst. Public Defender, Kansas City, for appellant.
William L. Webster, Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, Philip M. Koppe, Asst. Atty. Gen., Kansas City, for respondent.
opinion.panel: Before BERREY, P.J., and TURNAGE and ULRICH, JJ.Page 762
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] Appeal from denial of Rule 24.035 motion for post-conviction relief without an evidentiary hearing.
[2] Affirmed. Rule 84.16(b).
